description: Product Description OWTXIS Envision a Gorgeous New Look for Your Eyes OWTXIS focus on providing fashion and classic blue light reading glasses for women and men. We strive to create glasses that are long-lasting and comfortable for long-term wear every day. We love our customers and will always be here. Blue light blocking glasses are inspired by classic and stylish trend which perfect for your digital working and life. Suitable For Long Wearing Long time exposure to blue light would lead to digital eye fatigue. Wearing OWTXIS blue light blocking reading glasses, no more tired eyes. Reduce eye strain and sensitivity to light when facing digital screens. Great for office workers or anyone who has to look at screen all day. Minimize Headache Do you suffer headaches from long time screen time recently? OWTXIS blue light blocking reading glasses will supercharge your health by blocking detrimental blue light while letting in all other beneficial light. Sleep Better Blue light blocking glasses from OWTXIS are specially designed to filter out 99% of harmful blue-violet light. The premium features of SightRelax lenses, such as SightRelax Focus, make screen time more comfortable and help eliminate symptoms of digital eyestrain.Simultaneously OWTXIS Blu-ray filter glasses will improve your sleep and make you fall asleep.
